alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 3:24PM CDT until June 04 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Johnson MO, Cass and Henry Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Creek at Blairstown. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, The west bank of the creek begins to flood. At 23.0 feet, Flooding occurs at the west approach to the N Highway bridge located 0.2 miles west of Blairstown. Flooding also occurs across B Highway near Big Creek which is several miles northwest of Blairstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 22.7 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu 7pm 7pm 7pm Big Creek Blairstown 20.0 15.1 Tue 3pm 15.2 21.7 22.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
